name: input_dir
description: path to folder containing raw EEMs and absorbance data

name: output_dir
description: path to file location where processed data should be saved

name: metadata_file
description: name of metadata file, can be a .csv or .xslx, should be located in input_dir

name: blank_list
description: eemlist containing blanks for EEM data

name: metadata
description: a data.frame containing metadata in the form of [eemanalyzeR]{metadata}

name: dilute
description: perform dilution correction using dilution factors from metadata

name: eem_dir_read
description: loads raw EEMs from input_dir into R

name: pattern
description: a case-sensitive character string to be matched to the files in input_dir. only files matching the pattern will be loaded.

name: skip
description: a case-insensitive character string to be matched to the files in input_dir. any files matching this string will be ignored. useful for ignoring absorbance data.

name: file_ext
description: character. the file extension of the EEMs

name: recursive
description: logical. should the listing recurse into directories?

name: import_function
description: character or a user-defined function to import an EEM

name: abs_dir_read
description: loads raw absorbance data from input_dir into R
